title: A GRIPPING STORY
review: It was one of the great movies that I have seen .. the story , screenplay ,direction ,acting every thing was perfect . The most creative part was the very concept of the story - precrime. The suspence was great and ultimately the whole movie was awesomeA MUST WATCH FOR TOM CRUISE

title: A GREAT TALE ..
review: Fantastic story , great screen play , beautiful direction and commendable work by the actors . the movie really take us to the war

title: entertaining and gripping
review: Was having a new concept .. clearly gripping ...made me feel for it

title: great gatsby great movie
review: A very unique love story..... with a great cast . tobie and leonardo have done their job .. the narration to the story was perfect .... finaly a great movie
